official_title: To authorize the transfer of Coast Guard property to Dare County, North Carolina.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the department in which the Coast Guard is operating to transfer without consideration to Dare County, North Carolina, all rights, title, and interest of the United States in Coast Guard property and improvements at a specified location in that county. Requires the County to pay for surveying the property before the transfer.

titles.title: To authorize the transfer of Coast Guard property to Dare County, North Carolina.
